net.nightwhistler.htmlspanner.spans

Class ListItemSpan

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nightwhistler.htmlspanner.spans.ListItemSpan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.text.style.LeadingMarginSpan, android.text.style.ParagraphStyle

    public class ListItemSpan
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.text.style.LeadingMarginSpan
    This class is similar to Android's BulletSpan with the following differences: - Less options - Instead of drawing a circle we are using a utf8 sign as a bullet (for more compatibility) - Also supports ordered lists with numbers in front of the item

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.text.style.LeadingMarginSpan
